issues.title: MVP: Docker & API Foundation
issues.description: Epic for MVP milestone - Docker configuration and basic API validation

issues.title: Create Dockerfile for OpenCode server
issues.description: Create multi-stage Dockerfile that builds opencode from source and runs `opencode serve` on port 4096. Use golang:1.23-alpine for build stage and alpine:3.20 for runtime. Configure OPENCODE_MODEL=x-ai/grok-3-fast as default.

issues.title: Create docker-compose.yml for easy deployment
issues.description: Create docker-compose.yml that builds from Dockerfile, exposes port 4096, mounts ./workspace volume, and sets environment variables for model configuration.

issues.title: Build and test Docker container
issues.description: Build the Docker image and verify container starts successfully. Ensure opencode serve is accessible on port 4096 and responds to health checks.

issues.title: Test session creation API endpoint
issues.description: Validate POST /session endpoint creates a new chat session and returns session ID. Document the response format.

issues.title: Test message sending API endpoint
issues.description: Validate POST /session/{id}/message endpoint sends prompts to the AI agent. Test with simple prompts and verify responses via GET /session/{id}/messages.

issues.title: Test SSE event streaming endpoint
issues.description: Validate GET /event SSE endpoint streams real-time updates. Test connection stability, event format, and reconnection handling.

issues.title: V1.0: Web Frontend
issues.description: Epic for V1.0 milestone - Web frontend with SDK integration

issues.title: Create TypeScript SDK client library
issues.description: Create lib/opencode.ts with createOpencodeClient function. Support configurable baseUrl, session management, and message sending methods.

issues.title: Set up web frontend project structure
issues.description: Initialize Next.js or similar framework for web frontend. Configure TypeScript, set up project structure with pages/components/hooks directories.

issues.title: Implement useEventStream hook for SSE
issues.description: Create hooks/useEventStream.ts React hook for SSE event streaming. Handle connection state, event parsing, and automatic reconnection.

issues.title: Build session management UI
issues.description: Create UI components for creating, listing, and switching between chat sessions. Display session history and allow session deletion.

issues.title: Build file explorer UI
issues.description: Create file explorer component using GET /project/files and GET /file/{path} endpoints. Support file tree navigation and content preview.

issues.title: Add cost tracking feature
issues.description: Implement cost tracking UI to display token usage and estimated costs per session. Aggregate costs across sessions for billing visibility.

issues.title: V2.0: Production Ready
issues.description: Epic for V2.0 milestone - Security, scalability, and production deployment

issues.title: Add multi-model support
issues.description: Extend UI and API integration to support multiple AI models. Allow model selection per session using GET /models endpoint.

issues.title: Implement authentication layer
issues.description: Add authentication to protect the API. Consider JWT tokens or session-based auth. Never expose opencode serve directly to internet without auth.

issues.title: Add rate limiting
issues.description: Implement rate limiting to prevent API abuse. Configure limits per user/session and return appropriate HTTP 429 responses.

issues.title: Create Kubernetes deployment config
issues.description: Create Kubernetes manifests (Deployment, Service, Ingress) for production deployment. Include resource limits, health checks, and HTTPS configuration.
